bibl.title: Three Fragments of Terracotta Epitaphs from El-Koro and Karmel (Abu Hamed Reach).
Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.note: 1. Fragment of a Greek epitaph with the prayer ὁ θεὸς τῶν πνευμάτων (DBMNT 2890). El-Koro, perhaps 10th-11th century (palaeography). - 2. Fragment of an epitaph in Coptic (DBMNT 2891). El-Koro, perhaps not younger than 11th century (disappearance of written Sahidic Coptic). - 3. Fragment of an epitaph [in Greek?]. Karmel, probably before 11th century (palaeography).
